amendment.description: Amendment allows the SBA Administrator to make loans to homeowners to be used for the repair or replacement of toxic drywall manufactured in China.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 111-317 to allow the SBA Administrator to make loans to homeowners to be used for the repair or replacement of toxic drywall manufactured in China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nye amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
